MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Lon Cae Glas and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:42AM due to a faulty piece of equipment on our overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:47AM on 3rd April 2021.
